title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Tyreek Hill Trade, Post-Payton Saints, Jimmy G Market, Watson Pushback
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Tyreek Hill Trade, Post-Payton Saints, Jimmy G Market, Watson Pushback
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including his thoughts on the Chiefs future after the Tyreek Hill trade, if Hill makes the Dolphins a threat in the AFC East, his thoughts on Alabama's Will Anderson's draft stock, if the Saints can avoid a huge drop off without Sean Payton, why no one is trading for Jimmy G, and the predictable pushback the Browns are getting over the Deshaun Watson trade.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
